name: The Reaction and Reflex Test | QuarterMinuteGames
name_original: The Reaction and Reflex Test | QuarterMinuteGames
description:
Mini- game collection that compete the score with 15 seconds.

Target is circles, square panels, numbers, and so on.
The rules of the game as simple as do not need a description.

Join in the ranking to log in to Game Center!
You might be the fastest.
